sense.gloss: pile, heap, layers (e.g. of clothing), set (e.g. of boxes), course (e.g. of stones)
counter for things that are stacked, piled up (or layered, etc.)
layers of clothing worn under one's overcoat
combination of colors created by layering of garments (colours)
x: かさねの色目・かさねのいろめ

sense.gloss: to attack, to assail, to make an assault, to strike, to hunt down
to succeed (someone in a post, role, etc.)
following (a precedent, former policy, etc.), continuing with, sticking to, observing
to succeed (a person, to a position, etc.), to inherit, to take over, to follow
to patch (clothes), to mend, to repair
to add (e.g. charcoal to the fire), to replenish with, to feed with, to follow up with (e.g. remarks), to gather (one's breath)
invasion, raid, attack, visitation (of a calamity)

sdata.j: ↑狼↑↓おおかみ↓は↑普通↑↓ふつう↓、↑人々↑↓ひとびと↓を↑襲↑↓おそ↓ったりしません。
↑強盗↑↓ごうとう↓↑団↑↓だん↓は↑今日↑↓きょう↓、↑白昼↑↓はくちゅう↓↑堂々↑↓どうどう↓、もうひとつの↑銀行↑↓ぎんこう↓を↑襲↑↓おそ↓った。
sdata.e: The thieves knocked off another bank today in a daytime robbery.

sdata.j: ↑強盗↑↓ごうとう↓↑達↑↓たち↓が↑木陰↑↓こかげ↓から↑出↑↓で↓てきて↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑襲↑↓おそ↓い↑掛↑↓か↓かった。
sdata.e: The robbers fell upon him from behind the trees.

sdata.j: ↑強盗↑↓ごうとう↓は↑裏通↑↓うらどお↓りで↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓を↑襲↑↓おそ↓った。
sdata.e: The robber attacked her on a back street.

sdata.j: ↑強盗↑↓ごうとう↓は↑白昼↑↓はくちゅう↓↑堂々↑↓どうどう↓と↑郵便↑↓ゆうびん↓↑局↑↓きょく↓を↑襲↑↓おそ↓った。
sdata.e: The burglar broke into the post office in broad daylight.

sdata.j: ↑強盗↑↓ごうとう↓が↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓にそこで↑襲↑↓おそ↓いかかった。
sdata.e: The robbers fell on her there.

sdata.j: ↑強盗↑↓ごうとう↓が↑昨夜↑↓さくや↓↑銀行↑↓ぎんこう↓を↑襲↑↓おそ↓った。
sdata.e: A burglar broke into the bank last night.

sdata.j: ↑奇妙↑↓きみょう↓な↑病気↑↓びょうき↓が↑町↑↓まち↓を↑襲↑↓おそ↓った。
sdata.e: A curious disease struck the town.

sdata.j: ↑寒波↑↓かんぱ↓がヨーロッパを↑襲↑↓おそ↓った。
↑我々↑↓われわれ↓はその↑襲撃↑↓しゅうげき↓に↑対↑↓たい↓して↑準備↑↓じゅんび↓ができていなかった。
sdata.e: We were not prepared for the assault.

words.gloss: pile, heap, layers (e.g. of clothing), set (e.g. of boxes), course (e.g. of stones)
